alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:06PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 800 PM MST... At 706 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Globe to 9 miles southeast of Top-Of-The-World to near Kearny to 13 miles west of Dudleyville. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Globe, Superior, Miami, Cutter, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, Coolidge Airport, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Central Heights-Midland City, Kings Ranch, Boyce Thompson Arboretum, Gold Camp, Inspiration and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 204 and 258. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 265. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 153 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
